name: PlatformerGameThing DEMO
description:
An all new twist on the classic 3D collectathon! Explore different worlds with several unique characters, all with interesting weapons, and abilities for taking on baddies! Magnesis, Lag-dashing, Explosions oh my! Find treasure, meet new people, make friends, solve puzzles, and more on this epic return to the 3D collectathon!

NOTE: This is a DEMO, not a final product, it is nowhere near finished, and has a lot of work ahead of it.
